solution_line_template: He has sharpened in {num_sharpenings} times because {total_sharpening_cost} / {cost_per_sharpening} = <<{total_sharpening_cost}/{cost_per_sharpening}={num_sharpenings}>>{num_sharpenings}
He has chopped down {total_trees_chopped} trees because {num_sharpenings} x {trees_per_sharpening} = <<{num_sharpenings}*{trees_per_sharpening}={total_trees_chopped}>>{total_trees_chopped}
